page.title: 03Bacup news
page.content:
Another disaster has happened in Bacup. A local factory has been burnt to ashes. Its name is Cee Jays a shoe factory on Albert Street. About one hundred people are now out of work for ten weeks or more until new premises can be found. They are getting paid a percentage of their usual wage.
A certain well known sportsman has given Bacup a good name. That person is Brian Roche. He has won yet another victory in boxing after recently becoming a professional. This time he was fighting Lez Walsh who was a champion of his amateur class of boxing.
